fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints

Interface EndPointI<I>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractEndPointI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BCMEndPointI<CI>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BCMEndPoint, EndPoint, POJOEndPoint, RESTEndPoint

    public interface EndPointI<I>
extends AbstractEndPointI
    The interface EndPointI defines an end point connecting two software entities through an interface I in an implementation-agnostic manner.

    Description

    An end point embed a reference to be used to connect two entities, a caller and a callee. The protocol is to create the end point (with appropriate implementation-dependent information that is shared among the caller and the callee). The protocol is then:

    1. Create the end point, providing the implementation-dependent information required by its actual implementation.
    2. Pass a copy of the end point both to the server and client sides, using the method copyWithSharable to create the appropriate copies with the sharable information only.
    3. On the server side: call initialiseServerSide passing it a reference to the server side software entity; this must perform whatever implementation-dependent actions required to establish the connection on the server side.
    4. On the client side: after the initialisation on the server side, call initialiseClientSide passing it a reference to the client side software entity; this will perform whatever implementation-dependent actions required to establish the connection from the client side.
    5. On the client side: call getReference to get the reference implementing the interface I through which the server side methods can be called as long as needed.
    6. On the client side: when the end point is no longer needed, call cleanUpClientSide; this will perform whatever implementation-dependent actions required to cut the connection on the client side.
    7. On the server side: when the end point is no longer needed, call cleanUpServerSide; this will perform whatever implementation-dependent actions required to cut the connection on the server side.

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2024-06-24

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      • copyWithSharable

        EndPointI<I> copyWithSharable()
        copy this end point except its transient information i.e., keeping only the information that is shared among copies of the end point.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    return != null
 post    return.getImplementedInterface().equals(getImplementedInterface())
